alert.note: Alert for Iowa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 8:03AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN KEOKUK...WEST CENTRAL JOHNSON...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND EASTERN IOWA COUNTIES... At 803 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holbrook, or 15 miles southeast of Marengo, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Windham around 810 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Oxford, Homestead, Cosgrove, Tiffin, Amana, F.W. Kent Park and East Amana. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
